note: Arwen Jayne has written several novels exploring the metaphysics of personal and global transformation, ancient myths and conspiracies. The stories, over two series, weave together to create a vision of possibilities, beyond limitations, labels, taboos and the fixed ideas of the status quo. A mix of genres the novels involve kink and romance, science fiction and ever present danger while challenging conceptions of reality. Arwen has also written booklets on meditation and vedic diet.
